content.new: Converting from URDF to SDF ignores the name attribute of a link's collision tag and sets the name to <link_name>_collision. This causes problems when parts of the URDF such as the contact sensor reference the collision tag by name. In the attached file,
content.old: Converting from URDF to SDF ignores the name attribute of a link's collision tag and sets the name to <link_name>_collision. This causes problems when parts of the URDF such as the contact sensor reference the collision tag by name. In the attached file,

issue.title: Ignores collision tags name attribute when converting URDF files
